entry.title: Saturday night: Chance of rain showers or flurries. Low minus 10. POP 40%
entry.summary: Cloudy. 40 percent chance of rain showers early this evening then 30 percent chance of flurries this evening. Clearing near midnight. Wind northwest 30 km/h gusting to 50. Low minus 10. Wind chill minus 15 overnight. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EDT Saturday 1 April 2023

entry.title: Sunday: Sunny. High plus 4.
entry.summary: Sunny. Wind up to 15 km/h. High plus 4. Wind chill minus 15 in the morning. UV index 5 or moderate. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EDT Saturday 1 April 2023

entry.title: Sunday night: Partly cloudy. Low minus 2.
